title: Group of men, women, and children, including man wearing dark double breasted suit with light colored handkerchief in pocket, light colored collared shirt, and patterned necktie standing with head down and arm outstretched, standing around cart holding small boxes reading "Christmas greetings,"  in doorway, sign above double doors reads "parlor B," certificate on wall reads "the frontiers of America membership certificate," and dark curtain with swag in background, in interior, possibly Gaines funeral home
medium: black and white: Kodak Safety Film
